replies.body: MAGMA LUX BEST LUX
That's a weird way of saying Mystic
And that's a weird way of saying Storm {{champion:99}}
We all might just have a weird dialect
You mean that new Janna skin that slid under the radar?

Storm is my next fav
but Magma always 1st
That's a weird way of saying- who am I kidding nobody likes air.
What are you saying!? I use air waay more than i use storm. "I think you'll find this is the most refreshing way to die~"
More like Kill la Kill Lux cause the Magna version looks a lot like that one suit Ryuko wears lol
Actually Lux's voice actress is the same as Satsuki Kiryuin, you can hear it in her Magma voice. Just imagine Magma Lux yelling at her queendom on top of the Academy.

Magma Lux is hot.

:D
Agreed.
Hey all you lux mains lets add each other and spam lux on one for all when it comes back!
not a lux main but i need a ticket to the laser show
that'll be 70,000 Rp, i'm also not Responsible for any injuries caused by high exposure to deadly light radiation.
Gamma rays OP
Sounds fun! We'd need an AD lux, a Tank lux and 3 AP Luxes to work, though, but... I'd be down^^
yeeeeeeeeeeeeessss

I'd say to send in a support ticket, but this is *entirely* your fault, and Riot probably won't refund you the difference unless you get lucky. May's sales schedule was posted last month, and this skin was top of the Early Sales list. You're SOL for not checking in the first place when they've been doing this for two years now.
I bought this skin because they didn't have a launch sale and I thought ultimate skins don't go on sale... I feel ripped off

The launch was forever ago...
I don't see how you buying it earlier and being able to use it longer makes it a "ripoff" since NOW its on sale months after it was released.
Unless you really would have waited this long!

A little conflicted feeling on this skin being for sale as I did purchase it on launch.  However I do feel happy for those who can now afford it who could not before.  In the future I won't spend the extra money on launch, I'll wait ;3
Same here...hey, at least we got the pretty frame.
The ult skins always used to be on sale at launch, riot just moved the sale to a little afterwards this time around.
well i wasted my money
Which Icons does this sale lux come with?

Standard. Water, Nature, Fire, Air and Light.

The mixed elements + the border for the loading screen was the big bundle only.

Ugh. I'm going to see lasers every game now.

At least they'll be different colors.
does this bundle come with the origin lux with the border and the orgin icon
Nope. That was the incentive for buying the bundle at the time of release, and those perks don't ever come back.
Elementalist Lux can go on sale, but Graves can't have... Oh...
Let the bad joke die
i have to sell my organs for this{{summoner:7}}

> [{quoted}](name=Darkest Kitsune,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=7skR248q,comment-id=002c,timestamp=2017-05-18T17:21:02.473+0000)
>
> i have to sell my organs for this{{summoner:7}}

No no no you'll ruin your life that way, sell someone else's organs instead!
lol good idea
do we also get the icons ?
Yes, but not the Origin Icon or Border. That's for frontrunners of the pack, LIKE ME.

Well this is bullshit... granted i haven't bought her yet solely because i thought it was fucked up the lack of discount at release but i find it mighty pathetic of riot to cave in 

This is the ONLY legendary skin that has ever gone on sale after launch.

It never went on sale to begin with..for the first time in all their legendary skins and I bet it's because they knew fan boys would buy it regardless of a lack of discount.

You're fucked up riot and fuck you for doing that.

NOW.. many months later you put up the sale to reap the final bit of players who never got it.

You guys are class A pieces of sht
You realize that all Ultimate skins go on sale for a while after 6 months. Pulsefire Ez got hit harder, being on sale DURING launch.
Hey I bought this for a meme and NOWWWWW IT'S ON SALE?!?!
Rito, where's my border icon/symbol to brag that I bought this amazing skin at full price instead of being a normie. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Did this skin not sell well or something? It just seems odd for them to put this ultimate skin on sale and then ONLY this ultimate skin.
What about the people who bought it full price what do we get a better luck next time? thanks Riot I haven't spent thousands and years of my time
I'm speechless... just brought the skin last week and its on sell now...what can I say rito
You might be able to message the customer support team and get a one time refund for the difference.
NO I ALREADY BOUGHT IT
still expensive though
I can buy this skin and die many times as her in different colors!

Well... is it just me, or does the Elementalist Lux skin trailer feel like a star wars trailer? Like, seriously Rito... damn near perfect.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
